Introduction

TouchSky is an astronomical 3D viewer. This application permits us to do some research and design around 3D visualization of images of next generation large CCDs telescopes as the LSST one. It permits to visualize IMG_HDU in fits files but also large images stored in a multi resolution format (pfits = pyramid of fits). We can overlay objects coming from the simbad catalog.

See demos on YouTube by searching "Barrand TouchSky".
